author: jochembrouwer
content: I have a question about reorgs. Do reorgs where the Total Difficulty of the new chain is exactly the same happen on mainnet? If so, what is to be considered the canonical chain? I understand that the chain (block?) with the most transactions should be considered the canonical chain?

author: lightclient
content: <@508125616940515329> I believe the choice, in this case, is up to the node. Over time, a chain will emerge as the longest, and then it can be determined as canonical.

author: jochembrouwer
content: Right, it does make sense, the number of txns seems rather arbitrary
